transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: So very good morning Pravesh Sharma baat kar raha tha India Mart se.
Customer: Sir aadhe ghante mein phone kar lena bas thoda bank ka kaam kar raha hu abhi. Aaj main free hu.
Executive: Haanji. Theek hai. Aaj fir main batwa dena aadhe ghante.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is busy with bank work.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call after half an hour.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- callback, time, bank work
